Text:
Thanks for the Up!

Looking forward to watching this one!

It's a great chinese movie, probably the best I've ever seen. It's very deep and thoughtful xD And guys, please keep seeding at least 48hours after the download ends >> VIRIBUS UNITIS!
Cheers,
Wunik
Funny, given the title of the movie, that there is a a Brazilian who has 100% of this film and isn't sharing it at all. Well, maybe "scumbag" is a better term for that person.

Note to whoever wants to download this - this doesn't go full screen. There are black borders below and on the top which completely ruins the experience. One would think the uploader would  be intelligent enough to mention the aspect ratio and general specs before someone wastes his bandwidth to download a 1.34 gb movie which can't be viewed full screen. If I'd know this I'd have downloaded the 1.59 gb version available. This is bullshit.
